items.textToSpeech: Try commands like "gimme some reggae bass", "speed this up" or even "try something else" if you aren't happy with the instrument you just got.
Try saying “Add a funky keyboard” or “Give me a violin”
Try saying “Give me jazz drums” or “Add a soulful piano”
Try saying “Give me a jazz bass” or “Add some funky keys”
Try saying “Give me a train whistle” or “Give me country guitar.”
Try saying “Give me a cat meow” or “Add soul guitar”
Try saying “Give me an owl hoot” or “Add funky drums”
Try saying “Give me a ghost” or “Give me polka.”
